replies.body:
Hey Lord Kylar Alice - 

For this game, was it a premade group of 5?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=P4VmANLE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-22T19:48:47.857+0000)
>
> Hey Lord Kylar Alice - 
> 
> For this game, was it a premade group of 5?

Yeah it was. Starting to think it's not a bug but instead intentional. Regardless it was hilarious when it happened.
Yeah, it's a-okay if you're in a premade 5s group. Trust me, I freaked out the first time I saw it, too. :P
I've noticed it will let you do whatever you want in a premade of 5
